briefTitle: Improving Compliance With Medical Testing Guidelines
officialTitle: Improving Compliance With Medical Testing Guidelines
conditions: Breast Cancer, Cervical Cancer, Prostate Cancer, Colon Cancer, Lung Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Effect of educational intervention on providers' recommendations
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients: healthy men and women ages 30-89 seeing their primary care provider for routine visit
* Providers: non-pediatric primary care physicians from Mount Sinai Beth Israel or St. Luke's-Roosevelt associated practices

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patient life expectancy of less than 1 year in primary care provider's judgment
* Inability to read and understand English
* Transgender status
